tool_description: Find the Logo of each company in real-time. Using our logo finder service is entirely free with attribution. However, we require a link back to companyurlfinder.com on any page the service is used. Just use the following format to embed logos in your systems:
name: Logo
title: Logo

api_list.name: Logo API
api_list.description: Using our logo finder service is entirely free with attribution.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://logo4.p.rapidapi.com/logo/amazon.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "logo4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://logo4.p.rapidapi.com/logo/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "logo4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
